body.p: Bundles are the packages that offer a collection of services for an attractive fee. Subscribers select different bundles offered by service operators and a subscription is an assignment of a bundle to a subscriber.

Consider a postpaid bundle for data, voice, and text. This bundle includes a charging service with a preset amount of consumption for data, voice, and text. The services tariff also defines the rating for consumption beyond preset allocation of different services, which is done by referring to specific rate entities defining the amounts. For example, 2 GB of data, 500 anytime text, and unlimited evening texts.
A bundle can contain charging services.

An individual account can be associated with zero or more bundles. A device or a group can have bundles associated to them in form of subscription. If the subscription taken by a group, then all the members of the group can use that subscription.
